item.title: Musicblogger launched. Billy Corgan show. etcetc
item.description: So last night i went with scott to see Billy Corgan’s new show. My friend brian is playing keyboards in it so it was nice to see. The stage is amazing and i like billy’s new stuff. it was weird cuz i haven’t been to a concert in a very long time. so being at this one was like being at a concert in my living room. it didn’t seem real.
